contents.title: Customization
contents.text: Level of customization allowed to match specific brand needs.

contents.title: Ease of Use
contents.text: How easy the platform is to use for non-technical users.

contents.title: Accessibility
contents.text: Support for web accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG).

contents.title: Up-front Costs
contents.text: Initial costs required to set up a website.

contents.title: Ongoing Costs
contents.text: Recurring costs to maintain the website.

contents.title: Value for Money
contents.text: Overall value considering cost vs features and quality.

contents.title: Performance
contents.text: How well the site performs in terms of speed and responsiveness.

contents.title: Security
contents.text: Measures to ensure data protection and prevent hacking.

contents.title: Scalability
contents.text: Ability to grow or adapt the site as needs change.

contents.title: Features and Integrations
contents.text: Availability of advanced features and third-party integrations.

contents.title: Support and Maintenance
contents.text: Access to support and ongoing maintenance.

contents.title: Workload
contents.text: Effort required from the client to get the site up and running.

contents.title: Development Time
contents.text: Time required to create a functional website.

contents.title: Ownership
contents.text: Who owns the site and its contents after itâ€™s created.
